moduleInstalation:sql.sql1: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `damian` ( `name` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL COMMENT 'nombre del modulo', `label` VARCHAR( 255 ) COMMENT 'Etiqueta', `description` VARCHAR( 255 ) COMMENT 'Descripcion del modulo', `active` INTEGER default 0 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Estado del modulo', `alwaysActive` INTEGER default 0 NOT NULL COMMENT 'Modulo siempre activo', PRIMARY KEY ( `name` ) , CONSTRAINT `modules_module_FK_1` FOREIGN KEY ( `name` ) REFERENCES `modules_dependency` ( `module` ) ON DELETE CASCADE ) TYPE = MYISAM COMMENT = ' Registro de modulos';
